title: Black Swan, Books 10-12
description: Book 10. FALCON WINNER PARANORMAL ROMANCE NOVEL OF THE YEAR.  IT'S THEIR TURN!  NIGHT OWL REVIEWS TOP PICK. "...laughed out loud, ugly cried, and overall fell in love all over again with this new class (of Black Swan Knights)."  Book 11. JAX  • When you want a job done right, get a womanizing vampire. • Being a vampire playboy has worked for Jax for 600 years. • That's about to change.  NIGHT OWL REVIEWS TOP PICK. "The tale picks up right after the first book, moving flawlessly into the story at lightning speed, and never slows down."   Book 12. DELIVERANCE  If you capture a demon and force him to stay... love won't save you from his revenge.  NIGHT OWL REVIEWS TOP PICK... "We have been waiting for the tale of Deliverance, our favorite Incubus, for quite a while. Well, now he's here, and has he got a tale to tell!"
author: Victoria Danann
